  0x1C, // Width: 28
  0x18, // Height: 24
  0x20, // First Char: 32
  0x1B, // Numbers of Chars: 27

  // Jump Table:
  // start point (1), start point (2), data size, block width
  0xFF, 0xFF, 0x00, 0x1C,  // 32:65535 ' '
  0xFF, 0xFF, 0x00, 0x1C,  // 33:65535 '!'
